widgetButtons.alertDescription: Display penalty and disqualification alerts on screen during race sessions.
widgetButtons.autoDirectorDescription: Allow the tool to automatically switch between drivers on the grid that are producing the most action.
widgetButtons.code60Description: Displays a blinking Code 60 message on screen below the timer.
widgetButtons.commentaryNamesDescription: Show the commentators names. The names text can be set in the control panel settings.
widgetButtons.compareRaceDescription: Compared the currently focus driver to the driver ahead of them in the same class.
widgetButtons.directorSuggestionsDescription: Show the auto director driver weightings in a sidebar within the broadcaster control panel. The higher the weighting, the higher the chance the auto director will focus on that driver.
widgetButtons.driverOfTheDayDescription: Show a driver of the day. The name text can be set in the control panel settings.
widgetButtons.eventInfoDescription: Show information about the track and conditions on screen.
widgetButtons.focusedDriverDescription: Show information on screen about the currently selected driver.
widgetButtons.multiclassStandingsDescription: Display a list of the standings on screen. The multiclass colours are chosen based on the dominant colour in the class icon from the store.
widgetButtons.resultsLabel: Show Results on End of Qualifying
widgetButtons.resultsDescription: Allows the Qualifying results to be shown automatically on screen at the end of a session.
widgetButtons.safetyCarDeployedDescription: Displays a blinking safety car message on screen below the timer.
widgetButtons.safetyCarInDescription: Displays a 'Safety Car in this lap' alert on screen to show that the safety car will be pitting in on the current lap.
widgetButtons.sessionInfoDescription: Shows the name of the current session or phase along with the timer and country flag.
widgetButtons.trackMapDescription: Overlays a track map on screen showing the drivers and class positions.

configFile.useNewBroadcastUIDescription: Enable a beta version of the broadcaster controller UI (Default: false).
configFile.showStandingsManufacturerDescription: Show the manufacturer logo in the standings tower. A use case to disable this would be in single car cup classes like NSU or Porsche GT3 Cup (Default: true).
configFile.showStandingsFlagDescription: Show the driver country flag in the standings tower and results tables, replacing the manufacturer logo. (Default: true).
configFile.showTyreCompoundDescription: Show the tyre compound in the driver info widget for applicable classes. (Default: True)
configFile.indentFocusedDriverDescription: Indent the focused driver in the standings widget (Default: False).
configFile.showPortalTeamDescription: Show a drivers portal team name if they have added one (Default: False).
configFile.showPortalAvatarDescription: Show a drivers portal avatar in place of the country flag (Default: False).
configFile.showFullStandingsNameDescription: Show the full middle and last names of drivers in the standings tower (Default: False).
configFile.showRelativeStandingsTimingDescription: Show relative timings on the standings tower to the driver in front rather than the leader during race sessions (Default: False).
configFile.autoDirectorOnlyModeDescription: When enabled, the auto director will only direct a race and won't turn on widgets by itself. Useful for jumping between manual & auto directing without having to turn on/off specific widgets each time (Default: False).
configFile.showLiveryPreviewDescription: Show the livery of the car on the driver info and compare driver widgets (Default: True).
configFile.showComparisonSpeedDescription: Show the comparison speed (in KM/H) between 2 drivers in the compare info widget (Default: False).
configFile.showSlowDownAlertsDescription: Show slow down alerts from the stewards (Default: False).
configFile.showServerNameInTimerDescription: Shows the name of the server in the session info timer widget (Default: False).
configFile.driverOfTheDayDescription: Show Driver of the Day (Default False).
configFile.alertLengthDescription: Specify how long steward alerts should be shown on screen in seconds (Default: 15 Seconds).
configFile.qualifyingResultsDisplayTimeDescription: The amount of seconds before the end of qualifying to display the results on screen (Default: 25 Seconds)
configFile.continueToNextSessionTimeDescription: The amount of seconds before the continuing to the next session after a race has finished. This also affects how long the results screen is shown for. A value lower than 30 seconds is not recommended! (Default: 45 Seconds).

alertsWidget.illegallyPassingBeforePitEntrance: Illegally Passing Before the Pit Entrance
alertsWidget.accumulatingTheMaxNumberOfPenalties: Accumulating the Maximum Number of Penalties Permitted
alertsWidget.drivingWrongWayTrack: Driving the wrong way on track
alertsWidget.missedMandatoryPit: Penalty awarded for not taking Mandatory Pit within the Pitstop Window
alertsWidget.mandatoryPitOutsideWindow: Time Penalty for Mandatory Pit taken Outside the Pitstop Window
alertsWidget.slowDownTrackLimits: Slow Down Penalty, track limits abuse
alertsWidget.slowDownTrackLimitsContinuing: Slow Down Penalty, continuing to abuse track limits
